name: Nervous Bus (Bitgem Game Jam #10)
description:
How to play:

Keyboard arrows:
Up / down: move the bus vertical
Left / Right: De-accelerate / Accelerate

Fixing the Bus:
Holding  1 : Motor
Holding 2: Wheel
Mouse: LMB to spray fire extinguisher and operate the lever

Credits: Luiz Alojziak & Ricardo Bencz
Software used: Construct 2 + Aseprite
Music: Sergio Reis - Adeus Mariana (Karaoke)
